column1: 1,Confirm Order after Adding Item to Shopping Basket,Navigate to the home page and sign in. Proceed to the shop page and add an item to the basket. Complete the checkout process by filling in the required details and confirming the order.,"Step 1: Navigate to https://eco.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on link 'Sign In' -> Navigate to page 'signin'
Step 4: Click on link 'Shop' -> Navigate to page 'shop'
Step 6: Click on header  -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 10: Click on button 'Add To Basket'
Step 13: Fill checkout details and confirm order

column2: - Step 1: Click on button 'Next Step' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/step2'
- Step 2: Enter input value in input field 'fullname'
- Step 3: Enter input value in input field 'email'
- Step 4: Enter input value in input field 'address'
- Step 5: Enter input value in input field
- Step 6: Click on header
- Step 7: Click on input field
- Step 8: Click on button 'Next Step' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/step3'
- Step 9: Click on div
- Step 10: Click on input field
- Step 11: Enter input value in input field 'name'
- Step 12: Enter input value in input field 'cardnumber'
- Step 13: Enter input value in input field 'ccv'
- Step 14: Click on button 'Confirm'
